attributes.action: help all those both in and the ex members of HM Forces with Mental Health problems to access early treatments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been problems building with many servicemen returning from combat with Mental Health problems, the Mod says it is the fault of the individual that they are able to access treatments. GP's do not know how the system operates,or if in fact there is one for those in need of help.
And it's not just the individual, it's the family, friends and the wider community that is suffering
